phrases: At least I think I do.
I have talked about it with both my mother and father.
Come on, that is normal in the beginning.
You have got the etude, too, you know!
You have your back against the wall!
Do not talk about it, you will make me panic!
You were short on prep time from the start,
but thanks to all that flirting with that junior high girl...
I was not flirting with her!
What kind of conversation is this?
They are fighting over the phone.
Oh, man, I only got a C.
Maybe I will try for another school.
How did you do on your mock exam?
I only asked her because I was sure she scored lower than me!
Bow down before me, you dullards!
She is the one who said I had to check in regularly...
She took a turn for the worse...
Are you here to visit Kaori?
But I cannot find her anywhere...
Then I know where she must be.
She says she does not want to lose her stamina or muscle strength.
She says that she wants to play the violin onstage, one more time.
Let us take a break, Kaori-chan.
You are trying to do too much at once.
Violinists have more stamina than you think!
This is all thanks to you, Arima-kun.
Kaori had given up... she would thrown in the towel, really...
And now she is starting to walk again.
One sure step at a time.
All you did was show devotion, right, Arima-kun?
And that devotion was what struck a chord in Kaori's heart.
Even if it gives me only a little more time, even if there is only the slightest hope,
I am willing to cling to anything.
There was a boy that I met in April.
I cried and vomited, and struggled so hard it was unseemly...
But onstage, I shone like a star, and my life seemed like a gorgeous rendition of a melody.
I made a promise with that boy.
He said, Let us perform together again.
I want to struggle as hard as I can.
struggle like there is no tomorrow!
Because I am one of them, too.
If I go on wallowing in my despair, and just give up,
I can never face my parents, who gave birth to me, and raised me.
If I just give up now...
I would feel sorry for myself.
Kaori's heart had turned gray, and you gave it color.
He is been playing the piano all through the night.
I know the competition's coming up soon, but it is right after the culture festival.
He is going to break down.
Will he do okay on his entrance exams?
Well, that is Arima-kun's way of studying to get in.
To get into a music-oriented high school,
sure they test you on regular subjects too, but achievements trump all else.
Those schools want to burnish their reputations by admitting the top performers at competitions.
Since Arima-kun has not competed in the last two years,
he is sorely lacking in terms of achievements.
And now the Eastern Japan Piano Competition is coming up in December.
It is got a long history, and cachet like no other.
So for the school, there is no better advertisement
than admitting the cream of the crop from that competition.
In other words, to get to the top of the heap at the Eastern Japan Piano Competition
is the same for Arima-kun as passing an entrance exam.
It is like hitting a walk-off homerun, see.
So why do not you stop being jealous of music, and root for him?
It is better than having him flunk and head overseas, right?
Now might be my only chance to be near him...
Arima-kun must be exhausted, playing so late into the night, huh?
If you brought some food over, I am sure he would be thrilled.
It is not like I am doing this because Kashiwagi told me to!
Do not sleep like you are dead!
You are pushing yourself a little too hard, you know!
Would it kill you tidy up?
Are you showing up at the competition with that hairdo?
Are you sure you can do this?
You need a license, do not you?
I always just cut my own hair when I need a little trim.
By cutting your own hair, you just mean your bangs, right?
I will go the barbershop, okay?
You are only going to think it is a pain in the butt and not go!
Accept your fate if you are a man!
P-P-P-P-Please, I am counting on you...
Are not you cutting too much?
I am telling you, no sweat!
Remember how I used to do this for you when we were kids?
The competition's coming up soon, so I am going to make you look like a stud, okay?
You make it sound like I am usually a real tool.
What does Kao-chan say about all this?
Do not be jealous of music.
All I can think of is Kao-chan...
I am going to do my best.
I do not know what the results will be,
But I am going to give it my best shot.
The sound of the scissors, ringing in my ears.
His hair, a little hard to cut.
A scene of little significance passes me by.
Are not you on a diet, Tsubaki?
What is that supposed to mean?
If this time turns out to be precious for Kousei as well,
I am putting myself in your hands!
Do not you have to wait for your daily call from your friend with the glasses?
13:00 - Examination Room A 10:00 - 17:00 Examination Room B
Right now, I think he is in the thick of it!
This egg salad sandwich is light on the mayo and light on the salt,
which brings out its sweetness to the max!
And since they get these range-free eggs directly from the farms,
you can say it is the ultimate egg salad sandwich, seeking to capture the splendid taste of the egg itself!
N-Nothing's coming up but gastric juices.
I just hurled right now, you know...
This egg salad sandwich is light on the mayo and light on the salt,
which brings out its sweetness to the max!
And since they get these range-free eggs directly from the farms,
you can say it is the ultimate egg salad sandwich, seeking to capture the
splendid taste of the egg itself!
If you put a thick slice of ham in there, it would be even better!
Yeah, it is tough not to pick the ones with extra mayo, too.
Makes you crave some tea, huh?
Yeah, but katsudon's a real man's meal.
The florentines here are delicious, too.
If we are having tea, I would rather have scones.
The best milk is Moo Moo Brand.
The best kind of tea is Darjeeling!
Wow, they are really getting into it.
I like fillet cutlet sandwiches best!
Please get ready in the wings.
All right, then, I am heading out.
I wish I could fire off a cool parting shot or something, but I cannot think of anything.
I guess it is because...you know.
Now I feel like something is off.
This is the stage where I am parting ways with you.
Next I am going to get Class Elephant!
I am Take-chan of Class Giraffe!
My mother, who grew pessimistic about my future and the Aiza family's reputation,
made me take all kinds of lessons.
You should have him learn from someone who is more of an expert.
If I win, I get a chogokin robot.
I am going to destroy you all at once!
I have disappointed my audience, I have made my kid sister worry...
And my enemies are throwing me their support.
I am no different than I was as a kid.
How could I lose to that cold-blooded expressionless girl and that sissy four-eyed jerk!
I am not going to lose next time!
He raced all the way up Hyakudan Hill without stopping!
Why did not I see it before?
I thought I was the one who understood you better than anyone else.
But when I saw you for the first time in two years...
If it is an ugly performance, then that is the best I can do right now.
I think I kind of get it now.
You were the one who expanded my world.
I guess I never imagined that you would show up like this.
The scenery that I am looking for, and the sights that you wanted to see..
Contrary to appearances, he wants give a solid performance.
Try to really understand the composer's aim.
and experience the feel of blood and sweat-soaked score sheets.
No need to become Kousei Arima.
You are the one, Takeshi Aiza, who belongs to that line of pianists.
Are you going to push every inch of your intent through?
You little punk with that shallow jerk on retainer...
How dare you project such sensuality?
It is not just allies who support each other.
From your enemies, you learn so much, and gain so much.
Until the day you meet again...
Just knowing they exist helps you to withstand the loneliness.
Those who compete, even if they are enemies, help each other out.
I have been waiting for this day for two years.
I do not feel the slightest shred of boredom!
Now I can smash everything I have into something!
I am not going to lose next time!
I am going to demolish you!
There are amazing guys I can crash into, with every fiber of my being!
He is back in full force!
Arima-sensei's competing too, so am I supposed to cheer him on, or Brother?
I see that a troublemaker's been awakened...
I still have one more number to play.
The second piece was really hard.
What was up with that whole atmosphere?
You created that atmosphere yourself, did not you?
You should have played the Chopin piece second.
Was I able to reach him with my music?
Do not even think about messing up here, got that?
Because I am so going to destroy you in the final round!
You would better dial down the bravado...
You know what they say - all bark and no bite.
You better not have made a move on my kid sister!
Or people will think Nagi is not hot!
Final Contestants Aiza Takeshi Emi Igawa Arima Kousei
